participant_1.background:
I'm a mystery movie fan and a baker.
my father died when i was 2.
i need to use an inhaler sometimes.
I have a close relationship with my family despite my hectic schedule.
I want a home with a big yard for my dogs to run and play in.

participant_2.background:
I'm trying to spend as much time with my sister and Charlie as possible.
I am not concerned about my appearance in the morning because I have more important things to focus on.
i like all types of music.
My comic book collection was stolen from my apartment when I was away on vacation.
I play the piano, but only at home because caffeine makes my hands shake.

content.text: Hi! How are you doing today?
Good! I'm trying to spend as much time with my sister and Charlie as possible. How about you?
I'm doing well! I'm trying to get some baking done today.
That's awesome! I love baking. What are you making?
I'm making some chocolate chip cookies. I've been wanting to make them for a while.
Yum! I love chocolate chip cookies. I'm not a very good baker, but I love to eat them.
Well, if you ever want to try some of my cookies, let me know!
I definitely will! Thanks for the offer.
No problem! What kind of music do you like?
I like all types of music. I'm not really picky.
Me too! I love listening to music when I'm baking.
That's awesome! I love to listen to music when I'm doing anything, really.
I'm the same way. Music can really put me in a good mood.
I'm glad we have something in common!
